alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued October 12 at 12:16PM CDT until October 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WALWORTH...RACINE...SOUTHEASTERN WAUKESHA AND KENOSHA COUNTIES... At 1215 PM CDT, tornado producing storms were located along a line extending from near Big Bend to Waterford North to near Walworth, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornadoes near New Berlin, Burlington, and Lake Geneva. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Waukesha, New Berlin, Mount Pleasant, Muskego, Pleasant Prairie, Lake Geneva, Sturtevant, Union Grove, Paddock Lake, Williams Bay, Camp Lake, Wind Lake, Vernon, Twin Lakes, Rochester, Raymond, Wheatland and Yorkville. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
